section.name: Properties
section.p: The Metro system is a plugin that is established by Transit. The following path locations are used to locate and load property files.

tr.td: Site defaults set by system administrator.

section.p: Recognized properties are a function of the plugins that are loaded during metro startup. The first property identifies the system context plugin. The second property identifies the internal composition system that the system context will be supplied to. Additional property names and values are a function of the respective plugins.

tr.td: Declares the plugin artifact spec to use when establishing the application system context. Please note that modification of this value may impact available properties (refer to plugin specification for additional details).

Declares the plugin artifact spec to use when establishing the composition and runtime sub-system. Please note that modification of this value may impact available properties (refer to plugin specification for additional details).
